Recently, a comet was recorded in our sky.Some are convinced that this is a harbinger of future decline.Others believe that they are just fairies flying across the sky.Still others believe that the comet is a giant ball of ice flying in space, and its long tail is created by the energy of the sun.The controversy surrounding these three equally viable theories stimulates scientific research in our country.
Thank God we live in an enlightened time

Power in our country is completely in the hands of the liberals, and they believe that the time has come to convene a constitutional convention.The point of view of every person, well, or at least everyone whose opinion is really important, will be presented in this new meeting, designed to determine the further path of our glorious state.
Otherwise, people will take advantage of the situation for their own purposes.

The dream of a unified Central American state has sunk into oblivion.Other provinces were too preoccupied with Guatemala's dominance to appreciate the sacrifices we made to preserve the union.This will not happen anymore.We are done with this.From now on, Guatemala will be alone in seeking its destiny.

Dust settled in the fields of Waterloo, where the ideals of the French Revolution seemed to have ended at the hands of the old European regimes.In the wake of the disasters of theNapoleonic Wars, decisions made at the Congress of Vienna restored fragile tranquility on the troubled continent.Although the flames of the revolution have been temporarily extinguished, it will soon become clear that the ideas of civil liberties, nationalism and liberalism are more alive than ever before.In America, these same ideas threaten to plunge the young republic into a devastating civil war.Princess Victoria is 16 years old and will soon ascend to the throne of Great Britain, the greatest industrial empire that has ever sprung up in the world.Her ascension to the throne will mark the beginning of a long and successful reign and herald the beginning of an era that will last until the First World War.In this new era of unprecedented technological progress, beliefs that have been unshakable since time immemorial will be called into question, and new dogmas will take their place.From afar, because of the seas and oceans, the riches of Asia and Africa beckon, the melodies of which can also be heard in the European concert.Maestro, choose your instrument and let the music play!
Subdivision §Y$NAME$§W is being formed now, estimated completion date: §Y$DATE$§W.
Aircraft production requires rubber, electrical appliances and machinery.
Tanks are artillery on wheels.Therefore, the production of tanks requires cars and artillery.
Automotive production requires rubber, electrical appliances and machinery.
Radios were one of the first consumer products of the 20th century.They are made from glass and electrical appliances.
The invention of the telephone is a breakthrough in communication.The production of a telephone requires glass and electrical appliances.
The manufacture of electrical appliances requires rubber, coal, and iron.Electrical appliances are used in auto and aircraft construction.
Mechanisms and machines are essential in any production.They require steel and coal to create.
Artificial fuel factories produce combustible materials from coal.They are vital for states without access to oil.
Artificial rubber factories produce rubber from oil.They are vital for states that do not have access to rubber.
Artificial sulfur plants are a new milestone in the development of chemistry !.
This fuel plant uses oil to produce automotive fuel.
Steamers have an advantage over clippers, as they are not dependent on the wind, they are larger and more durable than clippers.They require steel and coal to produce them.
Ready-to-wear and silk are used to produce luxury clothing for the wealthy.
The production of luxury furniture requires furniture and tropical wood.Luxurious furniture is purchased by high society.
Coal and iron were used in the production of steel.Steel was used in the manufacture of weapons, rails and other structural materials.
In the production of artillery, steel and ammunition are used.Artillery increases the firepower of our army.
Clippers are simple merchant sailing vessels.Fabrics and lumber are required for their production.
The production of small arms requires steel and ammunition.All new divisions are armed with small arms.
Lumber is used for the production of furniture.Furniture is bought by all segments of the population.
In a paper mill, lumber is required to make paper.Paper is used in printing: books, newspapers and other sources of information.
For the production of casual wear for the general population, fabric and dyes are used.
The production of explosives requires fertilizers and ammunition.Explosives are used in artillery.
Many types of ammunition are produced here.Iron, coal and sulfur are used in the production.
The production of canned food requires steel and meat.Due to the long shelf life, canned food is used in the army.
Dyes can be obtained from plants or artificially using coal.
Alcohol is alcohol available to the general public.Grain is required to produce alcohol.
Wine is a symbol of high society.Fruit is required to make wine.
In the lumber warehouse, wood is processed into lumber for papermaking, ship and furniture manufacturing, and construction.
Cotton is required for the production of fabric.The fabric is used in the manufacture of sails and clothing.
Cement is the main material for the construction of particularly durable structures such as bridges and fortresses.The production of cement requires coal.
This plant requires coal to make glass.Glass is used in the manufacture of mirrors and windows.
In this plant, sulfur is used in the production of fertilizers.Fertilizers increase the productivity of our farms.

The Freikors are made up of revolutionaries professing a radical new ideology - fascism.These revolutionary militants, adherents of violence and mass actions, will stop at nothing to overthrow the old monarchies and young democracies and replace them with the Leviathan of the fascist state.

The Red Guards are made up of communists who have raised an open rebellion against the government and, more importantly, against everything that they consider to be reactionary signs of the bourgeois state and even society as a whole.Instead of the institutions of religion, tradition, private property and family, these revolutionaries seek to establish the dictatorship of the proletariat: the first step on the long and corpse-strewn path to the promised classless Utopia.

The civilian militia consists of liberals who have revolted against real or perceived oppression of citizens by the government and the state apparatus in order to protect their personal freedom at all costs.Fighting the tyranny of the state, these revolutionaries see themselves as freedom fighters in the true sense of the word.

The reactionary insurgents long for the return of the good old days.These can be inveterate monarchists or, in their words, simply opponents of modern ideas.These counterrevolutionaries are always at the forefront of the struggle against socialism and liberalism.

Pan-nationalist rebels want to unite the divided, according to their ideas, peoples in a free and independent nation-state.They are driven by the romantic ideals of the nationalist movement.The sense of belonging to the land they are fighting for turns them into a real threat to peace and order.
Nationalists strive to win freedom for their people.They are well equipped, they have great leaders, but they are not too eager to leave their home provinces.
The patriotic rebels dream of uniting with their cultural family in one state.Be careful: provinces they have captured can be set aside from your power.
The guerrillas are fighting the invaders and dream of driving the enemy out of their country.
These are disgruntled citizens, huddled in crowds for the purpose of plunder and looting.

Direct or indirect control over the many principalities, duchies and free cities that make up the German nation will allow us to unite our people into a single nation-state.Long live the German Empire!
If we take a dominant position on the Italian peninsula, we will be able to declare ourselves the main uniting force of our people and give them a national fatherland - a single Italian state.
The blessing of the fraternal peoples!

If we achieve a dominant position in Scandinavia, then we can unite the Scandinavian peoples under one flag.To do this, we must include all of Scandinavia either in our state or in our sphere of influence.For the good of the fraternal peoples!

Many decades have passed since the defeat of the Swedish armies in the Finnish War and the transition of the eastern half of our empire under the rule of the Russian Eagle.Although there are reports of growing dissatisfaction with Russian rule from Finland, few are willing to return to Sweden.Finns are now striving for independence or autonomy.Some believe that it is time to abandon all thoughts of Sweden's return to Finland.

The apparently futile debate over slavery threatens to split our country.If we pass a hard-line law in the House of Representatives and ban the submission of slavery bills to the House, then perhaps to some extent we will muffle the toughest differences.

Senators Henry Clay and Stephen Douglas introduced a compromise bill on slavery.Its main idea is the right of individual states to independently decide on the abolition of slavery.If we support this bill, then we can ease the tension on the issue of slavery, at least for a while.

Tensions over slavery are about to boil.If we accept Senator Thomas Corwin's amendment, we can prevent Congress from passing any amendments to the constitution that would prohibit or hinder slavery.This is a last resort, but our situation is also desperate.
The federal fugitive slave law will allow slaves to be returned to their masters in slave states.This, at least for a while, will calm the fears of southerners about abolitionism.

Individuals in the southern states disagree with the secession voices that are being heard among the proponents of extreme measures.If we unofficially support their congress, they may be able to calm the separatist sentiments.

The Ostend Manifesto invites the United States to annex the island of Cuba and turn it into a slave state to counterbalance the influence of the new free states in the west.If we support the manifesto, then the severity of the issue of slavery within the country will subside a little, but our reputation with the great European powers could be significantly damaged.

The passage of this law would effectively reverse the Missouri Compromise of 1820 and allow the sovereign people to determine whether to allow slavery in the former Louisiana Colony and in the territories spun out from it.The abolitionists will be outraged, but this law is necessary to prevent the collapse of our Union.

Congressman David Wilmot introduced an amendment to prohibit slavery in states created in the territory that Mexico ceded to us as a result of the war.The adoption of this amendment will calm the northerners, who are worried that part of the country is turning into a slave power.However, this will heighten Southerners' fears of abolitionism.

Given our position on theNorth American continent, as well as traditional cultural ties with the United States, a positive response to our request is highly likely.This means that our country will become part of the United States.

“Without a single cannon shot and without drawing a sword, we can bring the whole world to its knees if they dare to start a war with us ...What happens if there is no cotton supply within three years? peace to save the South, ”said James Gammond.\n \nIf we adopt the Cotton King policy and impose an embargo on cotton sales to European powers, they will enter into interstate conflict on our side.

“In the papers of the War Department, I saw a message from the Adjutant General of Massachusetts, which says that you are the mother of five sons who died a heroic death on the battlefield.I understand that none of my words will comfort you.Nobody and nothing can help you in your grief.But I will try to offer you the following: maybe you will find consolation in the gratitude of the Republic, which your sons fell to defend ?- Abraham Lincoln \n \n By sending this letter to Mrs Bixby, we will receive additional support from the people in the war.

This plan, proposed by Commander-in-Chief Winfield Scott, involved the strangling of the Confederacy with a tight naval blockade and the advance of troops along the Mississippi River.If we blockade the southern ports, we will cut off the supply of vital goods and increase their war fatigue.

TheNortherners are blocking our ports under Winfield Scott's Anaconda Plan.As long as the blockade lasts, our war weariness will grow very quickly, until one day they strangle us.We must get free access to our ports!

During the campaign in Georgia inNovember-December 1864, Major General William Sherman applied the doctrine of total war, best described by the term "Campaign of Terror against the Civilian Population of the South." It is often said that Sherman's actions deep in Confederate territory and the destruction of much of Georgia's civilian infrastructure broke the will of Southerners to fight.Use the General's methods - they can be the final nail in the coffin of the Confederation.
Luxor is in our hands, and now we can send an expedition to the Valley of the Kings for archaeological excavations.Discoveries made in Egyptian tombs can raise our prestige.

The Valley of the Kings in Egypt is an almost inexhaustible source of new archaeological discoveries.If we ask the Egyptian government to grant us a monopoly on excavations in the Valley of the Kings, then we can make all these fantastic discoveries without the participation of other great powers.
Many believe that our experiments with banning alcohol have gone too far and must be reversed.

The Sobriety League, emboldened by many victories against alcohol use and abuse, is lobbying for a nationwide ban on the sale, use and possession of alcoholic beverages.Opponents point out that the ban could turn the alcohol market into a lucrative business for organized crime.However, the Temperance League believes that alcohol is the root of many social evils, not the least of which is crime itself.

The Great Migration is called the exodus of South African farmers (mostly of Dutch origin - the Boers), from the British-controlled Cape Colony to the lands beyond the Orange and Vaal rivers, and to the Boer republics, founded by their compatriots in the depths of South Africa.

White people calling themselves Boers began to migrate from the British Cape to the north and east, beyond the waters ofNkome.We saw them walking along with their women and children, and we suspect that they want to stay here.But this is our land ...
If we define the border with the British Cape Colony, we will improve our relations with the United Kingdom.
If we define the border with the British Cape Colony, we will improve our relations with the United Kingdom.

The nobility of the Hungarian kingdom has for some time been demanding the expansion of the independent rights of the Hungarian people and the crown of St.Stephen.A draft agreement has been prepared, according to which the Kingdom of Hungary and the Austrian Empire will merge into a new political entity: the dual Austro-Hungarian monarchy.Save, God, protect, God!
Since we took over the former French region of Alsace-Leran, we should probably rename the streets, shouldn't we? Let's create the new Germanic state of Alsace-Lorraine!
The return of Alsace and Lorraine!
Since we have returned Alsace to its legal borders as part of France, we should translate the road signs back to French.

The Road of Tears is an English translation of the name that the Cherokee Indians gave to the forcible removal of the great Cherokee people from their homelands in Georgia, Tennessee, Alabama, etc.to the Indian territories created in Oklahoma.Under the Indian Relocation Act of 1830, this decision rests with us.

Our government has recognized the Black Hills in the Dakota as a Sioux possession.However, this area has not yet been explored for minerals.Recent reports indicate that the Indians are mining huge quantities of gold from this ridge of hills.One capable young lieutenant colonel, a certain George Caster, is ready to travel to the Black Hills to study the situation.

This law was signed into law by President Lincoln in 1862 and granted 160 acres of land to qualified citizens.This is one of a number of similar laws.Thanks to them, the image of America as a country of new opportunities has developed.

Initially, it was a memorandum for internal use on the results of an unofficial meeting of King William I with the French ambassador at the resort of Bad Ems in the Prussian province of Hesse-Nassau, sent by the monarch to the Chancellor of Prussia Otto von Bismarck.Bismarck changed its text, giving it an offensive character for France, and made it public.This became one of the main reasons for the Franco-Prussian war.By sending this dispatch, we risk provoking a war with France.

Almost a hundred years have passed since France and General Lafayette came to the aid of the brave young American Republic at the difficult hour of its birth.Since then, the American Republic has inspired all freedom fighters and reminded the world of what free people can achieve.French Republicans are proposing to mark the centenary of the birth of an independent nation with a gift to the American people to remind them of the historical bond that ties them to the French people.Long live freedom!

At this largest German shipyard in Kiel, many German submarines were built during the two world wars.The personal yacht of Kaiser Wilhelm II was also built there.The shipyard was founded in 1867 as the "North German Shipbuilding Society" and acquired by the famous industrialist Krupp in 1902, when it got its name.If we build this shipyard, then Germany will never have a shortage of ships.
We must be a great power to be able to do this.
