Modern industrial production methods and the widespread use of new building materials in the first half of the twentieth century gave impetus to the emergence of a new school of architecture and design, which decisively changed the traditional concept of style.Under the slogan "Form follows from content", straightforwardness, verticality and artificial disorder came to architecture and design.Representatives of this trend were Louis Henry Sullivan, Frank Wright, Walter Gropius and Le Corbusier, as well as entire schools, for example, the Bauhaus.

Jazz was born in the early twentieth century from a mixture of Western and African musical traditions.His homeland wasNew Orleans, a city in the southern United States.A mixture of fast, infectious rhythms and beautiful melodies that awakened the improvisational talents of the performers, which made one performance never look like another, and strong vocals spread around the world on records, on the radio and like movie music and conquered him.In the 1920s.jazz has become unheard of in popularity.Many connoisseurs of classical music saw the popularity of jazz as another sign of the spiritual decline of society and an expression of rebellion against traditional values.

At the beginning of the twentieth century, the growing gap between elite culture and folk cultures coincided with the strengthening and coming to power of supporters of new anti-liberal ideologies, which "in the name of the people" fell upon the vanguard with all the might of the state.Both communist and fascist regimes sought to create a "new culture" that would be understandable to the masses and would instill in them the views and values ??the regime needed.The masters of culture were faced with a tough choice: to fit into the framework set by the state, or to challenge it and pay for it.In the communist states, the new culture was called the "method of socialist realism"; the fascist regimes also had certain creative attitudes for cultural figures.

Philosophy is a sphere that reflects the development of human thought as a whole, a discussion about global issues, the answers to which we do not know, and to which the natural sciences cannot answer.This science touches on such a wide range of problems that it is sometimes called "eternal reasoning about everything in the world."

Kant's transcendental idealism assumed that the world can be cognized either through certain categories inherent in man, or empirically.This philosophy is sometimes called "moderate empiricism." Representatives of neo-Kantian idealism deviated very far from Kant's concept and approached classical idealism, although they used Kantian methodology.

While the neo-Kantians were trying to develop Kant's philosophy, Hegel formulated his own version of idealist philosophy.The basis of his worldview was the assumption that Mind and Spirit constitute reality, creating history, in which, however, there remains a place for human Will.The influence of Hegel cannot be overestimated, he had many followers, one of whom, Karl Marx, significantly reworked the views of the philosopher.

Proto-existentialism did not represent a separate trend in philosophy.Individual thinkers have tried to analyze various philosophical concepts and identify their shortcomings.Proto-existentialists considered it fundamentally important to give clear definitions to the concepts of intuition, time, intelligence, being, in order to subsequently avoid disputes arising from different interpretations of the same concepts.

Pragmatism is perhaps the only truly American school of thought.According to pragmatists, it is the desire to bring practical benefits that should be the basis of human activity.For pragmatists, experiment is not so much a method of scientific research as the main means of adapting the surrounding world to their own needs.

Empiricism in its extreme form, called empiricism, is the conviction that only that which can be experienced empirically exists in reality.However, moderate empiricism recognizes the possibility of reality existing outside of experience.In accordance with the idea of ??the transcendental nature of reality, a person is not able to cognize its essence and can only be content with studying its external manifestations.

Initially, analytical philosophy was a school of thinkers who wanted to free the logic and foundations of mathematics from outdated and untrue theses.Later, philosophers began looking for ways to bring language and formal logic closer together in order to create a basis for objective knowledge of reality.This trend ceased to exist when one of its most influential representatives, Ludwig Wittgenstein, abandoned his views and tried to prove their inconsistency.

Many of the philosophers in analytical philosophy have made a real revolution in logic.A great contribution to the development of modern logic was made by famous mathematicians, who, in the course of research in their field, also developed ideas important for logic.

Logical positivists denied the foundations of metaphysics and traditional philosophy.They argued that many of the problems raised by philosophy are in fact meaningless and are only relevant for the logical analysis of scientific knowledge.However, they did not manage to clearly formulate and substantiate their own principles.

This is a teaching about the philosophical aspects of language, especially about the meaning and correspondence of words, individual phrases and sentences.The philosophy of language does not consider the meaning of individual words or the correctness of sentences.The philosophy of language is looking for an answer to the question: what is truth? The philosophy of language is based on Wittgenstein's criticism of his own views and the achievements of the school of analytical philosophy.

Phenomenology is a theory according to which any phenomenon must be considered, taking into account the subjectivity of its perception.Phenomenology is considered neither realism nor idealism, and equally denies them.
Hermeneutics is one of the branches of phenomenology.Although hermeneutics does not exclude the possibility of explaining reality, it is much closer to idealism than to realism.

Existentialism is a teaching whose origins can be found, on the one hand, in the radical individualism of Kierkegaard andNietzsche, and on the other, in the philosophy of Husserl and even Brentano.These ideas were developed by Heidegger, Sartre, Beauvoir and Camus.They turned to questions about the meaning of life, in which a person, in their opinion, should be perceived as a being acting independently and independently determining the meaning of his actions.

The tendencies that emerged in the late 19th and early 20th centuries to abandon rationalistic explanations of human nature were caused by a revived interest in nihilism.Some philosophers have rejected the idea that human life has any higher meaning, given by God orNature.A person ceased to be considered as a value in itself, his Will came to the fore - the ability to intervene in events and achieve his goals.The most prominent representative of this trend of philosophical thought at the end of the 19th century was FriedrichNietzsche.The dire consequences of the wars of the industrial era in the early twentieth century strongly influenced other philosophers (for example, Martin Heidegger) and prompted them to develop the ideas ofNietzsche.Nihilism rejected absolute values ??as the basis of human behavior and, therefore, questioned the values ??and beliefs prevailing in the 19th century, and some of them were simply discarded.At the same time, the absolutization of Will encouraged criticism in relation to generally accepted norms and principles, as well as the search and creation of new ones.

At the beginning of the 20th century, it became fashionable among intellectuals to question the values ??and attitudes of the 19th century.Some of them began to demand a complete and final break with the past, in their opinion, necessary to build a new bright future, which promised the onset of the industrial era.Futurism emerged as a trend in art, its followers began to use new materials and new techniques in an attempt to express the power and speed of the new era in artistic form.Soon, Futurism became the embodiment of the rejection of traditional social structures and a call for their replacement with a new social, political and economic system, corresponding to the realities of industrial civilization.

In the 19th century, the horizons of scientific knowledge began to expand at an unprecedented rate.Doubts arose about the universal applicability of the universal model of the universe, which was completed in the works of IsaacNewton at the end of the 17th century.New, more accurate experimental equipment made it possible to reveal discrepancies between predicted theory and real behavior and interactions of elementary particles.In the works of great physicists (Albert Einstein, Walter Heisenberg, etc.), the mechanistic model of the universe was refuted, and an alternative model emerged, the key property of which was the unpredictability of the behavior of particles and the results of their interaction.This new theory was a big step towards understanding the basic principles of the existence of the material world,
This area covers the development of the social sciences and affects the social structure of your country.
Darwinism is a theory that natural selection is the basis for the development of existing and the emergence of new species.
Social Darwinism is an ideology according to which individuals or groups of people gain an advantage over others due to their genetic or biological superiority.
Sociology deals with the study of society, social institutions, and relationships.Sociologists are trying to predict what impact any steps of power will have on society.
Social psychology deals with the study of relationships between people, as well as what they think about society and how they affect each other.
Political science studies the political structure of states and state formations.
Social anthropology studies the origins of human society and the relationship between individuals.
Only another world can save our sinful souls!
We are one whole, social alienation is wrong, each individual, represents a small part of our entire nation, but together we are strength!

The spread of the principle of universal suffrage as the basis for resolving the issue of political power in society led to increased hopes for democracy as a means of satisfying the age-old aspirations of the common people.The growth in the number of small political parties soon marked the limit after which the system of liberal democracy ceased to fulfill its main purpose - to extinguish conflicts in society.The situation was especially aggravated during periods of economic and political crises.Disappointment with the ideals of democracy and hopes for a better life led to the search for alternative ways of organizing the political system.In 1930, the Spanish philosopher Jos? Ortega y Gasset wrote the book The Rise of the Masses.He warned of the growing danger to the ideals of liberal democracy that came from the masses, capable of overturning the political system and replacing it with such forms of social order that would destroy the very foundations of the existence of liberal democracy.According to the philosopher, this could be avoided only if democracy itself adapts to the conditions of the era of active participation of the masses in politics.
The decline of the West and the lost generation

The dramatic social, economic and political changes brought about by the industrialization that began in the 19th century, as well as the destructive wars of the industrial era, caused a crisis in the intellectual environment of faith in the stability of Western society as a whole.In 1911, Oswald Spengler began working on the book "The Decline of Europe", in which he concluded that industrial societies shaken by crises are at the end of the natural cycle of development of civilizations (rise, prosperity, decline and collapse).These ideas were a direct challenge to the traditional Western concept of the infinity of linear progress of society, governed by the human mind.The expression “The Lost Generation?by the American writer Gertrude Stein reflects the feeling of devastation and loss of oneself, characteristic of many veterans who survived the senseless massacre of the First World War.
This area covers the development of political thought and affects the political system of your country and the change in the mindset of the inhabitants.

Authoritarianism is a social structure with a very strong state power, the main merit of which is usually considered to be the preservation of stability.Often, authoritarianism incorporates some elements of traditionalism to justify why a particular leader should have all the power.
This order implied a clear division of people into groups standing at different levels of the hierarchical ladder.The higher the group was located, the fewer people were included in it.

Traditionalism is a doctrine according to which knowledge is passed down from generation to generation, so adherence to tradition is essential.Traditionalism completely rejects rationalism, which, according to traditionalists, leads to dangerous and unproductive changes in society.
Political religion is a doctrine that links politics and religion.Knowledge in political religion appears to be given from above and cannot be challenged.
Paternalism is the belief that the state should treat its subjects in a fatherly way and completely control all their actions for their own good.
Constitutionalism is a system of government based on a generally written constitution.Under such a system, all actions of the authorities must strictly comply with the constitution.
Individualism is a belief in the importance of a person and the virtue of personal freedom.This doctrine also states that the state should not interfere with the economy.
Rationalism is a doctrine according to which truth is not divine revelation, but what reason prompts a person.According to rationalists, reason, not experience, gives a person knowledge.

Secularization is the process of separating the church from the state, and art and education from the church and the influence of religion.In addition, secularization involves the transfer of church property to secular owners.
The conscientiousness of society is the motivation of people, based on strict adherence to moral and ethical principles adopted in society.
Egalitarianism is the theory that all people are equal and therefore the ideal is complete political, economic and social equality.
Collectivism is a political doctrine according to which people should jointly own all the means of production.
Determinism is a philosophical teaching according to which any event is predetermined.Consequently, determinists deny the possibility of free choice of fate.
Atheism is the belief that God does not exist.People who share this opinion try to compensate for the lack of supernatural power in various ways.
Social justice implied a guarantee of the observance of the rights of every citizen and the rule of international law.

To conquer power, a politician claiming leadership most often tried to enlist the support of representatives of the elite.This path was the shortest, but some politicians, mainly representatives of the liberal bourgeoisie, hoped for support from the masses, who in fact did not participate in political life.

For centuries, political elites have used the clergy as a reliable means of maintaining public order by maintaining faith in God and his church among the people.After the Great French Revolution and the Industrial Revolution in England, the conviction spread among liberal circles and among socialists that the state and society should be freed from church oppression.

Officials have always tried to free themselves from political control.They set their own rules and norms, hired people on their own.However, in some countries, officials were appointed from above, and the main criterion was their political views, which made it possible to ensure their loyalty to the current government.

Low origins have always been an insurmountable obstacle to the ambitions of the bourgeoisie.They believed that it was talented people with outstanding abilities who should play a leading role in the country.However, due to the privileges of the aristocracy, such people were forced to be content with the role of representatives of the lower classes, since only a noble origin made it possible to occupy key posts.

The blood of enemies, shed in numerous wars, is not always able to unite the people.The decisive factor is the conviction that people living in the same country are a brotherhood sharing the same principles, striving for the same goal.The proof is the common history, and the similarity of cultural values, and the need to confront an external threat.

Tolerance is tolerance towards representatives of other nations and the willingness to live with them in one country.But in practice, it turned out that representatives of some nationalities have advantages over other people.

This doctrine first appeared in the United States in the 1840s as a justification for the need to move to the West.After the appearance in 1823 of the Monroe Doctrine, which declared interference in European affairs inappropriate, the goal of the United States was seen in reaching its natural boundaries and spreading its cultural influence throughout America.According to the authors of this doctrine, greatness and expansionism were ordained by God for the American nation.

The country ruled by this doctrine seeks to expand its territory and increase its influence on the politics, economy and population of its neighbors by all available means, including military force.Since expansionism threatens peace and stability in the region, neighboring states and great powers will certainly try to resist such aspirations.

With the help of this ideology, the great powers tried to justify their colonialist policies.In their opinion, many peoples are uncivilized and cannot independently achieve a high level of development.They need to be helped in this by exercising fair but tough management and education of local residents.
The idea of ??creating national states spread throughout the world throughout the century, and sometimes national minorities launched an active activity in this direction.

Sometimes it happens that a country whose citizens have been told for many years that they are invincible suddenly suffers a military defeat.This defeat could be a national trauma.The country will start spending too much energy trying to understand what led them to defeat and who is to blame for it.Sometimes a national trauma can develop into revanchism.
After the defeat in the war against the eternal enemy, there will certainly be people in the country calling for revenge - a new war, the only way to wash away the shame.

At a certain stage, the development of ideas of radicalism led to the emergence of ideas justifying violence, the supporters of which argued that only with its help it was possible to create a society of a new type.

At a certain stage, the development of ideas of radicalism led to the emergence of mass demonstrations, the supporters of which believed that only massive protest actions, such as strikes, could raise the consciousness of workers and make them understand what they needed.
Terrorist acts were carried out to draw public attention to the essence of the police state and justice obedient to it.But usually innocent people suffered from the actions of terrorists.
Now, holding or threatening a general strike is the most effective way to achieve political goals.

To counteract political organizations that aimed to change the existing political structure, special police units were created.Some people saw it as an effective means of fighting political criminals, while others considered it a repressive body with the aim of strengthening state power.

This protest movement was aimed at combating the subordinate position of women and giving women the right to vote.The forms of protest varied considerably, from passive resistance to demonstrations.Attempts by the authorities to suppress the protest by force caused a storm of indignation among the majority of the population, and in the end the women managed to get their way.However, there is still a long way to go to full equality between men and women.

Followers of this direction of oratory, with their speeches, incited hatred and called for a fight against representatives of a certain part of society.In most countries, the authorities tried to prevent such activities, but they did not always succeed.

Nostalgic romanticism was one of the main trends in the culture of the era.Its representatives glorified past victories and the great history of their country.Very soon, nostalgic romanticism turned into a reactionary trend, defending the position of absolute monarchy and the church.

This worldview was based on the theory of natural law, the conviction that all people are rewarded with justice, which, in their opinion, is always relative.Therefore, attempts to make people equal are doomed to failure.

As the influence of socialist ideas grew in industrialized states, in some less industrialized countries, an understanding of the limitations of the idea of ??the ability of the working class to seize state power arose.In 1902, the Russian socialist Vladimir Lenin created the concept of a vanguard party as a small group of professional revolutionaries, which should lead the struggle on behalf of the masses, deprived of the ability or desire to independently wage a revolutionary struggle.After coming to power, such a party was supposed to establish full control over society and carry out all the transformations necessary to achieve the ultimate goal of the socialists - an ideal society for the working people.This idea spread mainly in left-wing political circles,
Participation of the masses in politics
Participation of the masses in politics

In the early twentieth century, the spread of revolutionary communist ideas as a potential alternative to the liberal and capitalist foundations of the social system led to the development of equally radical models on the right flank of the political spectrum.Right-wing ideas were aimed at eliminating the inherent weaknesses of liberal capitalism without obligatory, according to the ideas of the extreme left, revolutions that would deprive the upper and middle classes of traditional power and position.In the early 1920s.the main far-right ideas found their expression in fascism.From an ideological point of view, fascism as a political trend was not as monolithic as communism.The ideologists of fascism called for the reorganization of society in the interests of the entire nation, and not of some chosen class.The desires and concerns of each individual had to fit into the goals and needs of the whole nation, fighting with other nations for influence in the world under the leadership of a single party.Finally, fascist ideas were formulated in the writings of the Italian Giovanni Gentile in the early 1930s, and fascism became an effective alternative to liberal capitalism and communism.

Wars between states in the industrial era required the participation of huge masses of people.After the conclusion of peace and demobilization, thousands and millions of veterans returned to civilian life, who could not always adapt to it, but had military skills and were ready to use them if necessary.Left-wing and especially right-wing revolutionary movements sought to use such disaffected veterans as a force capable of withstanding the influence of their ideological opponents.During periods of economic and political crises, many states with a liberal ideology experienced difficulties in maintaining public order in the conditions of the activity of paramilitary formations created from war veterans.
Why do you only see cops when you don't need them?

This area covers the development of psychology.This science not only overturned the pre-existing ideas about man, but also systematized knowledge about human behavior, especially at the level of society.

The rapid growth of literacy in industrialized societies, coupled with the emergence of new means of communication, created the basis for developing new approaches to creating and stimulating demand for goods that efficiently established industries were producing in increasing quantities.Representatives of the advertising business have adopted new ideas about the nature of human reactions and motives, and also learned from the experience of state propaganda during the wars.The result has been a widespread use of simple and straightforward advertising methods.In the twentieth century, advertising became a part of culture and over time began to influence many areas of public life, including politics.

In the twentieth century, the role of wireless communication and information transmission has increased more and more.Their story began with radio, one of the inventors of which was Guillermo Marconi.By the early 1920s.states realized the enormous potential of radio, which could now be used to broadcast entertainment, news, propaganda and advertisements, and took control of radio frequency allocations.In some countries, a state monopoly on radio broadcasting was introduced, while others allowed the establishment of commercial broadcasting networks.By the 1930s.home radios have become part of everyday life, and politicians have appreciated radio broadcasting as a powerful means of influencing the minds.

The development of cinematography at the beginning of the twentieth century turned cinema into a mass art form.In the 1920s.technological advances made it possible to synchronize the soundtrack and the image on the screen, and this raised the significance and influence of cinema to new heights.The first sound film "The Jazz Singer" was released in the United States in 1927, and after five years, silent films were practically stopped.Cinema has become a part of culture and a powerful vehicle for political and international propaganda.
This area includes the development of energy and engines.Please note that every improvement in this area is a prerequisite for all other industrial technology improvements.
Daimler created the first car that went into series production.The car proved to be quite reliable, but slow, and it took a decade before having a car became common in high society.

This airplane became the first machine that was able to take off.It was insanely expensive, and only ten years later it turned out to create a car, the serial production of which was cost-effective.At that time, only very wealthy people could afford such a purchase.

The first widely used means of transmitting electricity over a distance was direct current, where the movement of electrons occurs in only one direction.This current is usually used by electrical appliances that need a low voltage.High voltage direct current is used to transmit electricity over long distances, especially through submarine cables, and on electrified railways.Thomas Edison was a supporter of direct current, but in the battle of technical standards,Nikola Tesla with his alternating current was preferred.

With alternating current, electrons move simultaneously in two directions according to the wave principle.Alternating current has won out in the toughest competition with direct current and has become the power source for most household and industrial electrical appliances and devices.One of the first devices to use alternating current was the electric chair.This did not contribute to convincing consumers of its relative safety compared to direct current.

A multiphase system, in which two or more phases are used simultaneously, makes it possible to transmit alternating current over long distances without significant losses.In industry, a three-phase system is commonly used, but at first a two-phase system was used.The polyphase system was invented byNikola Tesla, and it meant the final defeat of Thomas Edison and his direct current.

The mechanization of production implies the replacement of manual tools with machines and mechanisms.As a rule, it affects the equipment of factories and plants, the tools used and the technological process.
Sharpe and Roberts created one of the very first looms.Its appearance revolutionized weaving, which was no longer considered handicraft.
This loom made it possible to produce higher quality fabrics than before.
This loom made it possible to produce higher quality fabrics than before.In addition, the same machine could produce several completely different types of fabric, which made it very practical.
The use of a power saw made it possible to significantly increase the productivity of lumberjacks.
The use of a circular saw made it possible to cut logs into planks much faster.
The creation of this machine was the first step towards the mechanization of the labor of peasants and farmers and made it possible to significantly increase its productivity.
This agricultural machine made the labor of peasants and farmers easier and more productive.
The mechanization of slaughterhouses made it possible to facilitate meat production and increase its efficiency.
Precision machining allowed the smallest parts to be produced with high precision.These parts could be used to manufacture complex mechanisms.
The advent of machine tools made it possible to produce parts according to a specific standard, as a result of which the scope of application of interchangeable parts in industry began to expand.
Small arms of Whitney and Colt

The creation of machines, with the help of which it was possible to produce parts of small arms according to a certain standard, led to a decrease in the cost of weapons, facilitation of its production and repair.
New methods of packaging food have led to a sharp increase in food production and allowed people to live in large cities.

New knowledge about the fermentation process, the thermodynamic sequence during boiling and distillation, as well as the automation of the production of alcoholic beverages allowed the creation of large wine, brewing and alcoholic beverage enterprises, thus creating a new industry.
New technologies have dramatically improved the efficiency of various machines, resulting in increased industrial production.
It became possible to use machines powered by electric current in factories.As a result, production has become less labor intensive.
New discoveries in hydraulics and pumping techniques have led to the creation of pumps for the extraction of black gold from deep wells.
Drying food has increased the shelf life tenfold, and it has become much easier to sell food.

The introduction of the Ford system allowed for the mass production of goods.Thanks to the use of the conveyor belt and the specialization of workers, the quality has increased significantly and the cost has decreased.

Thanks to the introduction of the Ford system and the emergence of new technologies for smelting steel, it became possible to mass produce rails at a lower cost and, therefore, to actively expand the railway network.
The beginning of the mass factory production of weapons and ammunition has significantly increased the income from their sale in an increasingly severe arms race.
The invention of the refrigeration unit became a significant event for the food and distillery industry, allowing to increase the shelf life of products.
Metallurgy includes the extraction and processing of ores and minerals.Various technologies such as washing, beneficiation, grinding and smelting have significantly reduced the waste rock yield.
Bituminous coal is of much higher quality than brown coal, so the cleaning process is much easier.
Coke is a concentrated coal.It has a high combustion temperature, and its use allows the production of higher quality steel.

This technology made it possible to purify the ore from impurities, due to which the quality of the smelted steel decreased.With the use of new smelting methods, the quality of the metal has increased and the price has decreased.

This technology made it possible to purify the ore from impurities, due to which the quality of the smelted steel decreased.With the use of new smelting methods, the quality of the metal has increased and the price has decreased.

This technology made it possible to purify the ore from impurities, due to which the quality of the smelted steel decreased.With the use of new smelting methods, the quality of the metal has increased and the price has decreased.
This technology made it possible to more efficiently refine ore in steel production and, therefore, use in production of lower quality iron ore, which was previously considered unsuitable.
This technology made it possible to more efficiently refine ore in steel production and, therefore, use in production of lower quality iron ore, which was previously considered unsuitable.
This technology made it possible to more efficiently refine ore in steel production and, therefore, use in production of lower quality iron ore, which was previously considered unsuitable.
This technology made it possible to obtain thin sheets of steel beams and replaced blacksmiths with hammers.
The technology of adding a small amount of other metals to iron during steelmaking has made it possible to produce various types of steel, depending on the scope of further application.

The use of electric furnaces has led to the discovery of new uses for metals such as chromium.The introduction of chromium into steel creates a protective anticorrosive layer of chromium oxide on the surface of the product.Such steel is much more reliable against corrosion than conventional painted steel.Very soon, most of the tools, equipment and weapons began to be made from stainless steel.
The transport system has gone a long way in its development from a primitive horse tram that carried passengers at the beginning of the 19th century to the railway network of the 1920s.
This industry is engaged in research in the field of chemistry and electricity, as well as the use of their achievements.

Finally, the military leaders realized that just medical services in the units and subunits are not enough.It is necessary to have doctors of different specializations in them for the treatment of combat wounds.

The discovery of airborne bacteria and the invention of antiseptics revolutionized medicine.Opening injuries no longer meant the patient was amputated or died, and new drugs were able to treat most infections.
Vaccination increases the immunity of a person or animal to certain diseases.As a result of its use, cattle breeding has become more profitable.
Chemotherapy is the use of organic or inorganic low molecular weight substances to combat disease-causing factors by slowing down the metabolism.

The discovery of the phenomenon of heredity was the most important step towards comprehending life.Gregor Mendel (1822-84) suggested that any feature of an organism is inherited.The scientist proved this thesis during experiments with legumes.
This medical equipment made the work of doctors much easier and more efficient.
New drugs have provided protection against a disease transmitted by the bite of the tropics.
When performing operations on the chest, oxygen should not be allowed to enter the blood.When using pressure chambers, this danger is significantly reduced.
This technology made it possible to produce fertilizers in laboratories instead of using animal waste products.

Pyroxylin (fiber trinitrate) was obtained by A.Brakonno in 1832.In 1846-1848, Academician GI Hess and Colonel AA Fadeev investigated the properties of pyroxylin and showed that pyroxylin was several times more powerful than black powder.
This technology made it possible to start the production of fail-safe explosives from nitrates.Natural fertilizers have become the main source of nitroglycerin production.
Chemical process for obtaining wood pulp

Wood is made up of cellulose fibers joined together by a substance called lignin.To obtain wood pulp, it is necessary to break these fibers either mechanically or by means of a chemical reaction.This technology made it possible to meet the rapidly growing demand for paper in the printing industry in the 19th century.
This technology made it possible to start the production of industrial rubber from rubber-containing materials.As a result, rubber production has grown significantly.

The emergence of this technology gave rise to a new field of science - biotechnology.Konshtein andNormann were able to combine the fermentation process (enzymatic hydrolysis) with a thermodynamic process (catalytic hydrogenation).As a result, margarine was created, which significantly increased the supply of unsaturated fatty acids to people.
The ability to create various types of artificial dyes made it possible to use a new technology for dyeing fabrics, and the production of natural dyes became too expensive and almost stopped.
The invention of gas lamps made it possible to illuminate both small rooms and large enterprises.Thus, the day for man was no longer limited by the time from dawn to dusk.
When the soil is fertilized with carbon fertilizers, the yield increases, and the soil itself can be left fallow for a shorter period.
This chemical process leads to the separation of oil into fractions.It is based on the production of gasoline, the most suitable fuel for internal combustion engines.
X-rays can be used to examine damaged bones without surgery.Its use has facilitated operations and the rehabilitation process.
The invention of the light bulb made it possible to illuminate both small rooms and large enterprises.Thus, the day for man was no longer limited by the time from dawn to dusk.

With the invention of the telephone, people were able to communicate more often with friends and family.In addition, there have been fundamental changes in the exchange of information between various firms and organizations.
The advent of electric lighting has made it possible to illuminate both small rooms and large enterprises.Thus, the day for man was no longer limited by the time from dawn to dusk.

When cars replaced horses on the roads, engineers began to invent replacements for horses in the fields.Early experiments with steam agricultural machines were unsuccessful, but liquid-fueled engines revolutionized agriculture.John Keyes, Henry Ford and John Deere pioneered the tractor industry.

It was the first man-made fiber to be produced commercially.Viscose is produced from liquid wood pulp, which, when cooled, becomes a fiber that feels like silk to the touch.The crisis in international trade during the war years caused an increase in the production of artificial fibers, which replaced imported raw materials in the textile industry, which worked for both civilian and military needs.

This world's first plastic was created by the Belgian chemist Leo Hendrik Bakeland and in the 1920s.and quickly became an important material for the production of various goods.Among the advantages of Bakelite were strength, fire resistance and low cost.Bakelite held a dominant position in the plastics market until the mid-1950s.

The Bosphorus is a strait between Europe and Asia Minor, connecting the Black Sea with the Marmara Sea.Paired with the Dardanelles, it connects the Black Sea with the Aegean, which is part of the Mediterranean.Due to the strategically important geopolitical position of the Black Sea straits, their status since the ancient Trojan War has repeatedly caused international tension and served as a matter of concern for rival countries, especially during periods of weakening and replacement of one or another of the main great powers.From this moment on, the Ottoman Empire opens the straits for all ships in peacetime.
From this moment on, the control of Copenhagen determines the movements of all ships in the Baltic Sea during wartime.In peacetime, the passage is accessible to everyone.

Nasser al-Din was the first Iranian sovereign to travel to Europe and thus established the short-lived but important tradition of the Qajar dynasty.He sailed in 1873 and was appointed Knight of the Order of the Garter by Queen Victoria, the highest order of knighthood, and then in 1878 when he saw the RoyalNavy Review, and finally in 1889.amazed by the technology he saw, he wrote a very popular diary that was published in several languages, including Iranian, German, French, and Dutch.

On his first visit to Europe, Shah Mozaffar al-Din was introduced to a "cinematographer" in Paris, France.Immediately falling in love with the silver screen, the Shah ordered his personal photographer to acquire all the equipment and knowledge needed to deliver the film to Persia, and thus launched the "Iranian cinema" that quickly became popular.

Victorio was a fierce warrior and leader of the Warm Springs Group of the Chihenda Division of the Central Apaches.Over the course of ten years, he and his group left at least three different reservations, several times, despite his group's request to live on traditional lands.While roaming the US-Mexican border, they managed to raid and escape capture by the military and even win a sizable battle at Las Animas Canyon, before allegedly leading the Alma massacre.In $YEAR$, while driving along the Rio Grande in northern Mexico, Victorio and his group were surrounded and killed by Mexican soldiers in the Tres Castillos mountains in Chihuahua.By all accounts, he was one of the greatest Apache military strategists who ever lived.

Fiat has kindly agreed to provide us with military weapons for our army and now we have a mutually beneficial contract with them, and our army has received high quality weapons with a fast production rate!Now Italy, and especially its top can sleep peacefully.Now neither external nor internal enemy is a hindrance to us.Unless, of course, the army itself becomes the enemy.But did the army once overthrow its king and the oligarchs ?!

We are on the verge of a transition to a new era, from a traditional society to an industrial one.And in order to develop in the modern world, we need to catch up with the development progress of the first world countries.To do this, we propose to send our diplomats to the great powers and beg them to send their scientists to us, promising their countries favor, and some gifts to the scientists themselves.But we have not decided what to choose? We have three options: The first is to ask industrialists and scientists of manufacturers to come to our country and give us knowledge on how to better produce goods and collect raw materials, the second is to invite great philosophers, teachers and officials to give us knowledge about how to manage and develop our state, and finally, the third is to invite the military and weapons manufacturers to our country, so that they teach us to wage war no worse than European countries.What to choose? The choice is yours, O Lord!
We need industry! I want to use goods made in my country.
Only good governance will help us.
All questions can be solved with the language of weapons, and nothing more!

By inviting European experts, we gained excellent knowledge on how to build factories with better efficiency, got better tools and methods for collecting raw materials, which will give a good boost to our economy.

By inviting retired scientists, philosophers and officials, we gained precious experience in governing the country, educating the population, and, moreover, we learned new philosophical trends.All this will allow our country and our culture to develop.Truly a good choice for the development of the state!

Having invited great military leaders and major directors of military factories, we learned a lot about the production of weapons and the supply of the army, as well as about new tactics of warfare.Now we are truly the thunderstorm of all our small neighbors! Power is always built on blood !!! Probably...
I finally have products made in my country!
The beginning of the flourishing of our state!

Recently, we were choosing which path to choose on the path to civilization, and now that we have become a country equal to our European partners, we can introduce those innovations that we received thanks to our decision made in the past!

Recently, we were choosing which path to choose on the path to civilization, and now that we have become a country equal to our European partners, we can introduce those innovations that we received thanks to our decision made in the past!

Recently, we were choosing which path to choose on the path to civilization, and now that we have become a country equal to our European partners, we can introduce those innovations that we received thanks to our decision made in the past!

After long and very unsuccessful wars, Pedro's power was rapidly falling, and now the moment came when his power collapsed.For a month there have been protests and protests in the country, and today Pedro II was overthrown and expelled from the country.Now Brazil has a republic and universal power.Now that there is a free country nearby, the people of our neighbors want more and more changes! We have offered them unification into one country, where old people will be in power with the rights of autonomy.Almost everyone did not mind, realizing that they could not keep the power in their hands.Only Uruguay, where everything quietly refused, and the northern countries of the continent, where everyone is going to unite with Colombia, which is getting stronger and stronger.

Liberia has long been our partner, but times are changing, and more and more politicians talk about the colonization of Africa.We must participate in it and for this we must get possession on the continent! The territories of Liberia are the most suitable for us.

Liberia is ours and now we have the right to decide what to produce! Almost nothing is being produced in this country now, but we can well change that.There are several options.First, there are a lot of sheep in Liberia, which means you can get wool.The second is not to focus on the production of only wool, but also to start the production of dyes, since the territory allows it.And finally, the third, from our ambassadors from England - you can produce tea! Hmm, I don’t understand how he could get the court ...But if you don’t mind, then it can be implemented ...

Our relations with France are not permanent, France can be dangerous, and on the way to central Italy we have only plains, which will not help much to deter such a strong enemy.In order to somehow secure the western borders, it is necessary to build an "Alpine Wall" on the territory of Sardinia-Piedmont - this will protect us from the French.(Complete before learning Defense in Depth for the next mission in the chain)

A long time has passed since the construction of the "Alpine Wall" and at the moment it is quite outdated.We need finances in order to organize the improvement of the shaft and secure our borders with France.I would not want the cunning French to enter Rome in a couple of years.Protection comes first! (Complete before learning Rear Infiltration for the next mission in the chain)

For many years, the "Alpine" shaft served us faithfully, but now it is a pitiful sight! He will not be able to stop the enemy goat in the mountains, what can we say about whole armies in the hilly fields of eastern Italy? We need an urgent one so that "it" can save Italy from the French or other occupiers.(Complete before learning Infiltration to complete the quest chain)

We recently received territories near Venice, which must be held at any cost! To do this, it is necessary to build a network of fortifications in northeastern Italy to defend against Austria.After long negotiations, it was decided to accept the plan of the great Garibaldi.Our engineers will secure our eastern borders! (Complete before learning Defense in Depth for the next mission in the chain)

A long time has passed since the construction of the "Wall of Garibaldi" and at the moment it is outdated.We need finances in order to organize the improvement of the shaft and secure our borders.Safety over money! (Complete before learning Rear Infiltration for the next mission in the chain)

For many years, "Garibaldi's shaft" served us faithfully, but now is the time to finish the construction! While he cannot stop even 2 armies in the mountains, what can we say about a whole group of armies in the fields of eastern Italy? We urgently need money to modernize the shaft, but for now we are in a small, but danger! (Complete before learning Infiltration to complete the quest chain)
We received these territories, but mostly foreign people live here, these need to be corrected!
We have vassals who have too much autonomy, but we can issue a law to annex them and reduce their autonomy.Thus, we will strengthen our power over these territories.

We have long been living according to the stories of the great Leo, who once ruled these lands.He ruled strictly, but justly.One day he was fired up with the idea of ??finding out what is there, far beyond the ocean.And so, he gathered his retinue of lions, human slaves, his wealth and hit the road, but he never returned ...We passed on this story from generation to generation.These pale-faced invaders from across the sea do not believe us! But we know that this is true.It's time for them to prove it! We must unite and take back control of all the territories in which the lions live.Maybe we can find our leader, because according to legend, he is immortal! From now on we declare ourselves the state of Lvumbia! We will conquer the whole world and the Lions will regain their power over rebellious people.In the meantime, while the lion is gone, we will rule until the great Lion is found! Hooray!!!
It's time to tackle literacy issues in our country!

We restored the Arab state, but we were not even within the boundaries of the Arabian Peninsula, but now that we have captured all the countries of the peninsula, we can rightfully call ourselves the successors of the Arab Caliphate! ALLAH AKBAR !

We were able to defend our interests in northern Mexico with a pen and a sword, and now our prestige has increased in the eyes of the world, people are rushing to go to a strong Mexico, and not to a weak USA, besides, our citizens have made a joke of an incredible patriotic upsurge and many residents of the country are striving to army to protect against encroachment on OUR lands.

We are not ready to defend the territories of northern Mexico, we will have to give them to our northern neighbor if we want to survive in the geopolitical arena, but we will not leave our brothers and take the Mexicans to us in Mexico, they will all get houses in the suburbs of Mexico City, and whoever does not want to, we will force them!
Closure of the British East India Trading Company

The British East India Trading Company had too much autonomy, our country almost does not control it and it is increasingly moving away from us, besides, the company's money goes almost all to the development of the company itself, a miserable 1 percent reaches us! It's outrageous! We urgently need to do something, otherwise we will lose India! We propose to nationalize the company, put our people there and completely control it! This will keep India behind!

To modernize the regions of Java and Sumatra, we will take a cunning path: We will provide them with autonomy, but we will demonstrate our superiority along the way by building civilized relations there and eventually we will join them
Stage 2 Benefit of the industrial revolution

We gave them power, but with our strength these monkeys will not cope, we should send them equipment from our factories, let them study so that in the future they can use them in their factories ...Factories in the jungle? Hmm ...I imagine who will work there ...
Stage 3 Establish modern trade communication with autonomies

We created a huge merchant fleet and sent it to Java, let these natives adapt to civilization and communicate with merchants under the leadership of our merchant aces! So they will also bring us money from trade deals! Brilliant!

These idiots have managed to burn all the main rice fields!Now they have no food, and we have to transport tons of food and alcohol to this island! Although ...On the other hand, the natives will begin to get used to civilized life and will be more willing to buy our food and wine in the future! As the saying goes: "What is bad for a native, then profit for a genius European!"
Stage 5 Start preparing for industrialization in Java and Summatra

Lord, glory to you, Lord! We survived this hell on earth called Java! Finally, we will no longer carry food there, because some fool decided to smell the burning rice in the morning!Now they will produce their own rice, not simple yet, but canned! Have you ever eaten canned rice? And I no, I think no one ate, but now they will!
Stage 6 Let's Bring Democracy to These Wilds

After so much time, we finally got normal citizens from the natives (well ...almost), and now we can regain power over the island, we got what we wanted, albeit at a high price.Only the commandants were replaced during this time 4! One was eaten altogether ...Long story.But this is no longer important, you need to forget about it as a terrible nightmare and continue to live with civilized, our Java!

Punjab has a long and rich history, tightly connected with us, and although people there are not alike, and their faith is different, we still became very close for so many years, we must recognize the Pashtuns as our Persians! In addition, Punjab is rich in resources, and is convenient for mountains for defense.However, you need to negotiate with the Mughal Empire! If they disagree, we will have problems! We must understand that we are weaker than India and will not be able to fight it.
Power restoration of the Mughal Empire
We have regained our former greatness, now even European countries reckon with us, now we can deservedly be called the "Mughal Empire"!

We took control of central India, now we overshadowed all our neighbors, especially the western pseudo Hindu colonists who were going to create their own country here, but I will tell you: "India, for the Hindus, and the homeland of the Hindus, Punjab, should become their capital!"

We have united the southeastern and central peoples of India, now we can declare the creation of a new state - India! We proved to theNorthwestern Mughal barbarians that only Europeans can rule and rule these lands, for the glory of the queen!

Our country is well developed, but in spite of everything our population is very ...stupid! We must do something, we must train these barbarians to at least understand spoken English and write in their own language, even if it has to be done by force!

We have united almost all the territories of India, the Mughals are defeated.Our dependence on the Queen is small, we ourselves will continue to increase our wealth.We are in our golden age, but how long will it last?

Our history is inextricably linked with Korea, we have always either fought or cooperated with them, they were the only ones with whom we communicated outside of our great islands, but the time has come for development and we must annex the territory of Korea to ourselves, this is an excellent springboard for the colonization of China.We are on the cusp of civilization!

After long wars and ordeals, we were able to capture Manchuria together with Korea! This is a brilliant victory for our country! We showed the whole world that we deserve to be among the great powers! Few people want to contact us after we defeated China and its vassal Korea.Glory to the Imperial House!

Having received Korea, we got access to the Continent, to China! And we took advantage of this.We equipped the troops with the help of the occupied territories and started a war with China, the war was difficult, but we won!Now, when such an ear as China has been defeated, all the powers look at us with apprehension, if we were able to defeat China, then what prevents us from defeating others?

The Great Powers have launched Operation Chinese Dragon! We also took part in it and got Taiwan in the course of it! This is an excellent territory, and an important port for our fleet, and we are ready to recognize it as our own, from now on Taiwan will be considered part of the Japanese archipelago!

Vietnam, distant colonies, but useful for our country.It is located on the periphery of our empire and there are important ports of our fleet and an important point for access to the Indian Ocean and Oceania.Control over it gives us additional respect from other powers.

We got multiple colonies on the east coast of Asia.We can't get a piece of Africa, but we can start colanizing the Pacific Islands! Few people will go there, but there are a lot of them and there are probably a lot of resources there! To start colanization, we need a better platform, and some large islands in the heart of the Pacific Ocean are best suited for this.If we get them, we can colonize even the islands off the American Coast.If they are there.

We are the most powerful country in the region, but Russia can compete with us, it can harm us, we need to strike a preventive blow and weaken it! As a target for the war, we can declare Primorye and Sakhalin.These territories are inhabited by peoples close to us by blood, so I do not think that the population will be against us.Most likely they will even help us!

The Philippines is a huge archipelago of strategically important islands that controls almost any route from Singapore to Tokyo and back.If we get the Philippines, we will be the monopoly of the freight transport to the Eastern shores of Asia.Everyone will pay us, no one will be able to sail from East Asia to other parts of the world except America without sailing through our territories.There is, of course, a way through Australia, but it is more expensive than a way through the Philippines, even with our transit fees.

TheNetherlands is at the intersection of 3 great empires, and we must learn to benefit from neighboring powers, we intend to conclude mutually beneficial relations between our countries, but we will have to choose only one patron from among our neighbors.However, you need to understand that despite the advantages, we will be highly dependent on our neighbors.
In spite of everything, our cooperation with the previous state was allowed, we became more independent, but for sure there will be someone else who wants to get a tidbit from our agreements.

French diplomats have long wanted to get themselves the Savoy, but stubborn Italians refuse! The French people are tired of enduring, France officially declares its claims to Savoy! If the Italians do not want to give it for the good, it will be for the bad!
We control the Singapore Strait from Asia to Europe, thus we have strengthened our dominance at sea, and we also receive income from trade traffic!
We got the Singapore Strait from Asia to Europe, with this we strengthened our dominance at sea even more, and we also get income from it!

The strait will give us the strength of the Vikings!

Capture of the Bosphorus and Dardanelles

We got the Bosphorus and Dardanelles - an important economic and trade point that controls all traffic from the Black and Marmara to the Mediterranean Sea, with this we have strengthened our dominance at sea, and we also get income from trade traffic!
For a sick man of Europe, they are useless.
Loss of the Bosphorus and Dardanelles
We have lost the Bosphorus and the Dardanelles.Now we do not receive income from this trade route, we urgently need to fix it, we have lost a lot from this!

We captured the Kiel Canal - an important economic and trading point that replaced the Danish Strait and controls all traffic from the Baltic to theNorth Sea, thus we have strengthened our dominance at sea, and we also receive income from trade traffic!
The Germans were never the true owners of Kiel.
We have lost the Kiel Canal, now we do not receive income from this trade route, we urgently need to fix it, we have lost a lot from this!

We captured the Suez Canal - an important economic and trading point that replaced the Strait of Gibraltar and Aden and controls all India's traffic to Europe, this greatly strengthened our dominance of the sea, and we also receive huge profits from trade traffic!
It is good to be on a par with the Egyptian pharaohs.
We have lost the Suez Canal, now we do not receive income from this trade route, we urgently need to fix it, we have lost a lot from this!

We captured the Panama Canal - an important economic and trade point that replaced the Strait of Magellan and controls all traffic from Europe to Asia and to the opposite shores of the Americas.With this, we have greatly strengthened our dominance at sea, and we also receive huge profits from trade traffic!
It's nice to control a quarter of the world's traffic.
We've lost the Panama Canal.Now we do not receive income from this trade route, we urgently need to fix it, we have lost a lot from this!

Turkey is gradually losing its power, you need to fix it! We need to revive our country at the expense of other countries' investments in us!

Our state is weak and will not be able to focus now on both spheres of military operations, we need to choose what we will develop: theNavy or the army? The navy will give us the opportunity for hygemony in the Subterrestrial Sea, and the army will help us in the fight against our neighbors.

There are many iron and coal mines in Diyarbakir-Van, in addition, there are fertile farms and fields in the south, but they work there with primitive tools, and the mortality rate is high.We need to fix this! We can invest in modern equipment to get more resources in the future, besides, this will help us in building an industrial base there, and if the experiment is successful, then it will be possible to transfer it to other regions of our country!

The experiment in Diyarbakir-Van was successful, now it is possible to gradually improve the equipment in other regions, for example, in Trebizond.Thus, our entire mining industry in our country will work better and will help us in case of war.
Experiments in the mining regions of our country have shown their great efficiency and now we can, with the help of our knowledge and means, improve equipment throughout the country.

The culture of our people and our country is little known, both for the people and for other countries, we need to invest in the cultural sphere, send our unfaithful specialists to world exhibitions, let the whole world learn about the majesty of our culture, and we learn about them, it's good will accelerate the development of our culture.
Arabia is gradually losing its power, you need to fix it! We need to revive our country through the investments of other countries in us!
Persia is gradually losing its power, you need to fix it! We need to revive our country through the investments of other countries in us!

The result of the construction of the Trans-Siberian Railway was the opportunity, which arose by 1905, for the first time in the history of Eurasia, to travel by train without using ferry crossings from the shores of the Atlantic Ocean (from Western Europe) to the shores of the Pacific Ocean (to Vladivostok).The Trans-Siberian Railway connects the European part, the Urals, Siberia and the Far East of Russia., Russian western, northern and southern ports, as well as rail links to Europe, on the one hand, with Pacific ports and rail links to Asia.
The mod is adapted for multiplayer, but also playable in single player, select the category you want to watch

First of all, you need to get the minimum number of priests in the country (2%), which gives the maximum number of research points (RP) for this, put national priorities on priests and study ideologemes.After ideologems, it is worth studying medicine, as it will give you a large population growth

Next, pay attention to your budget, it would be best to put the maintenance of priests and officials at 100%, duties are also maximum, taxes on the population too, but over time, reduce taxes for all groups of the population.If you have a combat fleet, then if you do not need it in the next 5 years, it should be disbanded (do not disband transport ships)

Try to capture as many colonies as possible, but be careful not to cross the road to powers that may threaten you.After ideologems and medicine, you should strengthen your position in 3 ways: 1 tech and commerce and industry (for non-belligerent and more or less literate countries), 2 cultural tech (for illiterate countries), 3 military tech (for countries that start to fight early)

The main mechanic of the game, and accordingly the most important one is the population, try to increase its growth in all possible ways: reducing emigration and increasing immigration, technologies for population growth, medical reforms, the seizure of territories

Research points (RP) will help you to get ahead, which means to strengthen your position on the world stage, increase due to: literacy, pluralism, priests, culture technologies 2 columns, clerks, position on the world stage (great powers get more), the seizure of territories ( only for non-civilians), as well as with the help of individual solutions and events

China can be captured only after its unification (about 60 years and after) and in one region (bordering with you or coastal) The main colonization begins in 70 after the invention of "colonial relations" and goes through your colonial power, which can be increased from assistance: higher-level ports, ships, selected maritime technologies

At the beginning of the game, forget about the capitalists - they are still useless, you should accept the party with state capitalism and build the industry yourself.Only after your industry gets stronger, and resources continue to increase, you can move to a market economy with a free market, where you will receive more benefits from taxes, and not from duties.There are 2 theories of building factories: 1) Resource: build factories in regions that have resources that these factories consume to get a bonus to production, 2) Commodity: build factories that your country can provide with resources.Depending on your playstyle and country, you will have to balance these 2 theories

Employees begin to appear normally after reaching 50% literacy in the country.Do not forget to build a military industrial, since at the beginning of a war, your industry may not be enough to provide an army, while this sector is extremely resource-intensive, so you should increase the number of iron mines and coal mines available to you.Taxes and duties are the backbone of any economy, you should increase their size by increasing the population, industrial and commercial technologies, adjusting sliders, capturing colonies and regions, as well as improving industry and gradually enriching your population

A lot of army and navy - a lot of expenses, so always be prepared for the fact that in a war you will have to support your army and navy! Also, do not forget about social spending, thanks to them you reduce the aggressiveness of the population, but you still spend money.Colonies and their products will greatly help you get rich, so don't forget about them.

column2: Important technologies: 1) Army: machine guns, military control, 2)Navy: technologies that give colonial power, 3) Commerce: commercial banks, printing money as needed, 4) Culture: all technologies of philosophy, biology, nationalism and imperialism 5) Industry: internal combustion engine, machine manufacturing, interchangeable parts, medicine, inorganic chemistry, electricity, power generation

Army: 1 column - mainly defense, as well as tanks, 2 column - guardsmen, front width, engineers, as well as attack, 3 column - artillery, 4 column - mobilization and gases, 5 column - tactics and morale.3 AND 5 MOST IMPORTANT.Fleet: 1 column - ports, 2 column - ships, 3 column - fleet strength, 4 column - fleet consumption, 5 column - fleet organization

Commerce: 1 column - taxes, 2 column - management efficiency and taxes, 3 column - mostly prestige, more cost efficiency, 4 column - output from mines and farms and influence points, 5 column - output efficiency

column2: Small tips for playing multiplayer and more
Rejoice! The blessing is in unity.
We can focus on assimilation in one of the metropolitan regions for 5 years.
Using our influence in Canada, we remove the governor and appoint a new one.After that, we have to choose a new course for the development of the state: liberalism, conservatism or reactionism.
Our country is widely inhabited by this culture and it would be good to recognize it for the more effective functioning of the country.

Using the rights of the governor, we can increase the production of one of the resources (iron, coal, wood, oil, wheat or fruit) by 15% for 5 years.After the expiration of this period, it will be possible to change the resource by the same decision.

We can colonize this region if we are supported by the local population.At the moment it suffers from a shortage of housing and if we build houses for them, then we can surely enlist their support.But for this we will have to prepare supplies of iron and wood to start construction.We will also need to ask Britain to pass on the colonial experience to us.

We can colonize this region if we are supported by the local population.At the moment, it suffers from a shortage of heating and clothing, and if we warm and dress them, we can enlist their support.But for this we will have to prepare stocks of casual clothes and coal.We will also need to ask Britain to pass on the colonial experience to us.

We can colonize this region if we are supported by the local population.At the moment it suffers from the shortage of a WIDE range of goods.We can say that they are in poverty.We are obliged to help them.We will also need to ask Britain to pass on the colonial experience to us.

We can colonize this region if we are supported by the local population.At the moment, it suffers from a shortage of food and if we feed them, we can enlist their support.But for this we will have to prepare grain reserves.We will also need to ask Britain to pass on the colonial experience to us.

Great Britain emerged from the Seven Years' War as the main naval power and from that time our power at sea increased.We now have a powerful industry that allows us to build ships at a significantly higher speed than our competitors.

Thanks to the fact that Great Britain was the first to make the industrial revolution, we now have a huge gap in the production of goods with high added value, a significant gap from other countries.In the future, they may catch up with us, but today we are the first!
Canada is in a new light and gets its fair share of migrants who want to leave the old world and start a new free life.
Cape Town is a large shopping center, and thanks to this we can get more money, and our people live much better.

Today in India many of the achievements of civilization brought by the British are used.New methods of teaching, agriculture, mining, previously inaccessible, will lift our country to greatness.

Today in India many of the achievements of civilization brought by the British are used.The colonial administration is extremely efficient at siphoning off resources, and capable Indian youths have the opportunity to travel to London to study.But is it good?
Today in India the people are celebrating liberation from colonial oppression.The last Briton leaves the country! For good, time will tell.

The colonists in India are poorly versed in how to manage such a large colonial power, their racial policy is not effective, in order to get more resources from the colony, we need to spend money on training officials.

Finally, we have freed ourselves from the shackles of this giant!
Although we became independent, our economy collapsed a little, this will not last long, our economy will soon adapt

The literacy of the Hindus is minimal, we need to correct it as soon as possible, in modern times the country of illiterate people is simply not capable of life! Allocate some money to subsidize the education of noble Hindus and teachers at home

Although rich and privileged Indians are educated and quite literate, at least compared to ordinary Indians, but this is less than a percent of the population, we need more people to get education.It was decided to build paid schools so that all Indians with incomes above the minimum could study there.

We are finally ready for our first step towards universal literacy! From now on, education is available to everyone free of charge for 4 years! This is still not ideal, but from now on any Hindu can get an education, although its quality is still very much honored.

Our general education system, although it works, is not very effective, the quality of education is lame, it is necessary to conduct a campaign to popularize school education, moreover, from now on, students are taught a large number of subjects for 6 years, and textbooks and other things for learning are brought from Britain itself!

So the day has come when from now on India is not a backward and illiterate country, we may not have caught up with the Europeans in terms of literacy, but in terms of learning rates, India has definitely come out ahead!

Through the British East India Company, Britain receives a huge amount of paints from India, Britain can be said to control the entire production of paints in the world, which allows them to dictate their terms on the market, and factories simply "dump" deficient goods for which paints are needed on the market!

Unlike its competitors, France and the United States, England does not have cotton plantations, neither on the mainland nor in the colonies, at least before! From that day on, everything changed! We made the decision to finally use the East India Company to extract cotton and transport it to Britain, now we can compete with our rivals, not only in politics, but also in the market!

Sinsatsiya! Rubber trees have been discovered in India! This is an extremely valuable resource in our time! We must immediately go and cut this forest! We need rubber! I'm going there right now to cut down the first tree myself!
But for the extraction of rubber, rubber trees do not need to be cut down ...

In order for our country to prosper, we first of all need the local population to be kind to us, and the African population loves the British most of all, if they are Englishmen themselves! This means that we need to carry out the assimilation of the population, the only question is, in which region to start?
We still have influence over Canada and can influence both it and its elections, why not use this to bring a party loyal to us to power?

We worked for a long time and now it finally happened, our diplomats were able to persuade the British to put pressure on African tribes and pseudo African countries, now they are dependent on us, albeit with great autonomy!

This is the end of the process of accession and reduction of the autonomy of the African countries we had previously taken.Although we tried to do everything peacefully, but it didn't work out without blood, some people were against joining, and we had to send an army to calm the rioters, we even had to use weapons, unfortunately people died, but in case of war more would have died!

Our experiment was more than successful, mines and farms where new techniques and tools were applied began to bring in 2-3, oto and 5 times more than they gave before, we are obliged to improve our developments and put them into operation!
